Pronouns are an especially important and interesting part of speech. They point to a face, but they do not name it. Therefore, pronouns refer to English grammar and this topic cannot be ignored if you want to write and speak English fluently. Since there is no gender category in English, pronouns very often act as gender determinants. Now that you have realized the importance of this topic, you can start learning.
At first glance, the topic of pronouns in English seems simple, but there are some subtleties that need to be understood. For easy memorization of the use of pronouns in English, we have created our application.
There are many ways to learn English and English pronouns. We will use one of the most effective ways - learning English pronouns by reading texts and books.
Our application offers you a large selection of texts and books on any topic. You can only read what you really like! Thus, you not only learn pronouns, but also get interesting information or read books in the original.
Before starting the training, you have the opportunity to choose exactly the type of pronouns that you want to learn (personal, reflexive, etc.). You can also learn all pronouns at once. Then you must choose a text or a book. Our algorithm will cut pronouns from the text. Now you need to carefully read the sentences and insert the correct pronouns. Thanks to the context, you can not only theoretically use the correct pronouns. Based on the surrounding words, you will understand why this or that pronoun is used in this case. This way of learning will help you replenish your vocabulary and quickly start using the learned pronouns and constructions in speech or writing.
Our app also contains a short course on the grammar of the use of English pronouns. English grammar is divided by the type of pronouns and it will be convenient for you to find exactly what you need. The information is presented there briefly, but succinctly enough for you to systematize your knowledge.
You can use our app for self-study English or as an addition to your English textbooks. Regardless of your language level, our application will be useful and comfortable to use. Even if you are just starting to learn English pronouns or have an advanced level of English, you can easily read texts and books.
Spend your free time with benefit and use our application, reading books improving your knowledge!
